body.text: In conjunction with World Mental Health Day, JKP Zone 3 will be organizing a Treasure Hunt inside Da Men Mall, USJ!
So please come and join us by clicking the link below to register!
There will be lot's of goodies to be won!

title: Walk-A-Hunt: Walk for Depression Awareness
subtitle: Don't walk alone, walk with us!

body.text: Come and join us at "Walk-A-Hunt: Walk For Depression Awareness" - a treasure hunt event that aims to raise awareness and de-stigmatise depression.
Each team will have to WALK around Taipan, USJ10, where they must compete to solve puzzles based on street signages and to answer questions relating to mental health and depression.

An exhibition by professionals, support groups and non-government organisations (NGOs) related to mental health will be presented, to spread awareness of depression and educate the community on where to seek help.

title: Majlis Sambutan Hari Ibu Peringkat MPSJ dan Pelancaran Indahnya Raya

body.text: Semua dijemput hadir memeriahkan majlis sambutan tersebut. Terdapat pelbagai aktiviti untuk disertai seperti:
• Majlis Sambutan Hari Ibu Peringkat MPSJ.
• Persembahan Tarian Kanak-kanak dari Sekolah Kebangsaan Seksyen 2 Bandar Kinrara.
• Pertandingan Mewarna dan Aktiviti Sand Art untuk kanak-kanak.
• Penyampaian Bantuan Sumbangan kepada Golongan B40 Jumpa anda di sana.
